title: Smoked salmon, prawn and cucumber mousse
description: This 1970's classic was a dinner-party favourite for a reason - it looks mighty impressive and tastes amazing. For this recipe you will need a piping bag fitted with a large plain nozzle.
ingredients: 1 large cucumber, peeled and very finely sliced
1 lemon, juice only, plus extra lemon wedges to serve
300g/10½oz cooked tiger prawns, shells removed, de-veined, plus 6 extra tiger prawns, shells left on
Melba toast, cut into quarters, to serve
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
